summary: i created this mod because i need a good follower and im fan of saints row the third
descriptionHtml:
Shaundi can be found at the in in dragonbidge

This mod REQIRES:	
ApachiiSkyHair  http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168

If you would like to make her look like she does in the images you will need
Better Females by Bella  http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2812
No More Blocky Faces http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30
Demon Hunter Armor - CBBEv3 and UNP http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27060

i do relize that this is not exact and this was the first time i have ever used the creation kit.
author: TheFreindlyNord
